description: This file defines a React functional component 'Cart' that renders a shopping cart page, displaying cart items, quantity controls, totals, and a checkout button. It uses context for state management.

methods.name: Cart()
methods.description: React functional component rendering the shopping cart interface.

calls: dispatch({ type: 'SET_QTY', payload: { id: String(b.id), qty: b.qty - 1 } })
dispatch({ type: 'SET_QTY', payload: { id: String(b.id), qty: b.qty + 1 } })
